@AnGobanSaor @rosanna_davison @HermannKeppler @CNMIreland They're all charlatans. She's a bright woman, knowingly making money off bull.
@Zanzibarry @_mrb.. improved equality over years. Saying it's just finished now is silly. There's still huge disparity.
@Zanzibarry @_mrb Childbearing: the same argument that has been used to suppress women's right to work for generations and yet we've...
@Zanzibarry @_mrb You must be a wind up merchant. Biology is fixed. Ergo, society must be structured to enable equal opportunity.
@Zanzibarry @_mrb A choice btw? How on earth do you think the species can get propagated?
@Zanzibarry @_mrb Are you for real? So a woman has to choose between a career and being a parent but a man doesn't. Weak thinking.
@Zanzibarry We're def not as many countries but when people are telling you they're discriminated against, you need to listen.
@Zanzibarry That's not true. Unless you've completely missed discussion around childcare, careers, etc. Also disabled have less rights.
@Zanzibarry @_mrb It's equality Barry. Simple as. Just good old fashioned equal work for equal pay. Equal rights.
@Zanzibarry @_mrb It's not a matter of opinion. If you like it that way and don't want change, that's another thing.
@Zanzibarry @_mrb I'm Irish too Barry. I don't need to tell you how many of the Dail, legislature, top jobs are male. You know you're wrong.
@_mrb @Zanzibarry Iceland is the most equal country in the world and women are still paid 14% less than men.
@Zanzibarry @_mrb I'm sure they don't
@Zanzibarry @_mrb Which western countries? They sound great.
